idea: The WW Project is a forum where various professionals and learners can learn and grow by working together. It also focuses on providing professional help in planning meals and developing a healthy lifestyle and nutrition habits. The goal is to promote knowledge about one’s eating habits, lifestyle modifications, and knowledge exchange
name: The WW Project

idea: Vjourno was incorporated in March 2019, as a private limited venture. VTPL has created a platform for sourcing credible HD digital videos. The platform rides on a gig economy model with enrolment of exclusive stringers, both amateurs and professionals, across 700+ districts in India. The model allows the media houses to buy geo-tagged videos from a secured C2B marketplace, or source a video through push notifications on the smartphones of the stringers, and receiving the desired footage from the desired location. High degree of automation via digital wallets and UPI interface ensures transactions in real time. The model has been designed to ensure scalability and embeds multiple levels of security. The model is geared to service adjacent revenue streams from insurance, financial institutions and governmental bodies for video surveillance, audits and video evidences.
name: VJOURNO TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are building a multi-purpose drone specifically targeting farming applications. Product is intended to provide useful outcomes for farmers in terms of crop scouting, cattle/herd management, pre-season sowing assessment, fertilizer/pesticide spraying. Usage of product will lead to develop innovative and smart farming culture amongst the stakeholders.
name: Aero Angel

idea:
Coralband Communications is communication strategist and implementation partner. Coralband is the one-stop destination for corporate communication & CSR services.

We serve as a communication arm for businesses. Working with start-ups, we manage all communication needs as a corporate communications partner. For large businesses, we provide bespoke solutions as required.

For mid-size firms we hand-hold through communication & CSR projects from concept to development. We work with the company and its agency partners or parent organization as a dedicated communications function. This will help organizations maintain a lean team or outsource the communications functions to us.
name: Coraband Communications

idea: inspectLogs provides tooling to front end developers to monitor and debug their applications in production and quickly reproduce issues exactly as the customers faced it
name: INSPECTLOGS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: At Globalview, we believe in providing quality guidance, our motto is to build relationships of trust, and the mission is to develop innovative solutions for our clients. We utilize advanced, comprehensive financial planning software to better serve you.
name: Globalview Financial Services LLP

idea: SafalDarshan - india's only platform dedicated to provide the best pilgrimage experience to devotees from india and across the world
name: Safal Darshan

idea: We aspire to be India’s preferred destination for the widest range of financial products including Retail loans, SME loans, Credit Score, Rectify Credit, Elite services, and Mutual Funds. Along with the quality service, we have been guided towards customer-first philosophy. This guiding principle is a reflection of our commitment towards ensuring the most hassle-free experience in procuring a loan, be it for personal needs, or that of your business. We are committed to ensuring the best experience in terms of customer service and satisfaction with our selfless attitude and humble approach. This journey began in 2016 with the dream of becoming Mumbai’s well-known loan distributor. With a bunch of 5 experienced professionals, we offer the best solution to our customer’s financial needs.
name: SALASAR FINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
